## JSONSerialization variable

Create a serialization by JSON.parse/stringify

**Signature:**

```typescript
JSONSerialization: (
    replacerAndReceiver?: [
        (((key: string, value: any) => any) | undefined)?,
        (((key: string, value: any) => any) | undefined)?,
    ],
    space?: string | number | undefined,
    undefinedKeepingBehavior?: 'keep' | 'null' | false,
) => Serialization
```
